content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>  <reference anchor='RFC2139'>  <front> <title>RADIUS Accounting</title> <author initials='C.' surname='Rigney' fullname='Carl Rigney'> <organization>Livingston Enterprises</organization> <address> <postal> <street>4464 Willow Road</street> <street>Pleasanton</street> <street>California  94588</street></postal> <phone>+1 510 426 0770</phone> <email>cdr@livingston.com</email></address></author> <author initials='C.' surname='Rigney' fullname='Carl Rigney'> <organization>Livingston Enterprises</organization> <address> <postal> <street>4464 Willow Road</street> <street>Pleasanton</street> <street>California  94588</street></postal> <email>cdr@livingston.com</email></address></author> <date year='1997' month='April' /> <area>Security</area> <keyword>Radius</keyword> <keyword>accounting</keyword> <keyword>authentication</keyword> <keyword>remote authentication dial in user service</keyword> <abstract> <t>    This document describes a protocol for carrying accounting    information between a Network Access Server and a shared Accounting    Server. </t></abstract></front>  <seriesInfo name='RFC' value='2139' /> <format type='TXT' octets='44919' target='http://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc2139.txt' /> <format type='XML' octets='45934' target='http://xml.resource.org/public/rfc/xml/rfc2139.xml' /> </reference>
